titleStmt.title: A description of time applied to this present time. With times merry orders to be observed.
titleStmt.author: Saltonstall, Wye, fl. 1630-1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. O[kes] for Francis Grave, and are to be sold at his shop on Snow Hill, neare the Sarazens head,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop on Snow Hill, neare the Sarazens head
